sentences.en: Condensation will eventually cause the fabric of the building to rot away.
sentences.cn: 冷凝作用将最终使建筑结构腐朽掉。

sentences.en: Eventually I broached the subject of her early life.
sentences.cn: 最后我提到了关于她的早年生活的话题。

sentences.en: Eventually Sam persuaded her to accept an offer of marriage.
sentences.cn: 最终萨姆说服她接受了求婚。

sentences.en: Eventually the police were called to move them on.
sentences.cn: 终于有人叫来警察驱散他们。

sentences.en: Eventually they reached a pair of ornately carved doors.
sentences.cn: 他们最终来到一扇雕刻精美的对开门前。

sentences.en: Eventually, she got a job and moved to London.
sentences.cn: 最终，她找到了工作并移居伦敦。

sentences.en: Eventually, the army caught up with him in Latvia.
sentences.cn: 最终，大部队在拉脱维亚赶上了他。

sentences.en: Eventually, the water will permeate through the surrounding concrete.
sentences.cn: 最终，水会渗透进周围的混凝土中。

sentences.en: Eventually, you'll learn to cry that on the inside.
sentences.cn: 终有一天，你会学会让泪往心里流。

sentences.en: He eventually escaped and made his way back to England.
sentences.cn: 他终于逃脱并返回英格兰。

sentences.en: He eventually sold the shares back to the bank at a premium.
sentences.cn: 他最后以高价把股票回售给银行。

sentences.en: He was eventually diagnosed as suffering from terminal cancer.
sentences.cn: 他最终被诊断出患了晚期癌症。

sentences.en: I eventually realized I had to change my attitude toward medical practice.
sentences.cn: 我终于认识到自己不得不改变对医务工作的看法。

sentences.en: Mobutu ascended through the ranks, eventually becoming commander of the army.
sentences.cn: 蒙博托出身行伍，通过一级级晋升，最终成为了陆军司令。

sentences.en: She eventually had to lock herself in the toilets to avoid him.
sentences.cn: 她最后只好把自己锁在厕所里来躲开他。

sentences.en: The five survivors eventually reached safety, ragged, half-starved and exhausted.
sentences.cn: 5位幸存者最终到达安全之地时已经衣衫褴褛、饥肠辘辘、精疲力尽。

sentences.en: They were eventually pacified by officers of the local police.
sentences.cn: 当地警察最终把他们镇压了下去。

words.tran_cn: 最后的，结果的；可能的；终于的

trans.tran_en: after a long time, or after a lot of things have happened
